meanings.definition: Involving or relating to multiple parameters.
meanings.sent1: The research project required a multiparameter analysis of the data.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used a multiparameter approach to solve the complex problem.
meanings.sent3: The multiparameter experiment resulted in some unexpected but interesting findings.
meanings.sent4: Her multiparameter skills in data analysis set her apart from other researchers.
meanings.sent5: The multiparameter nature of the project made it both challenging and rewarding.

meanings.definition: A device or system that measures multiple parameters simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The multiparameter device displayed real-time readings of various factors.
meanings.sent2: The hospital invested in a multiparameter monitor for patient care.
meanings.sent3: The multiparameter gadget beeped loudly when all readings were normal.
meanings.sent4: The multiparameter machine was a lifesaver in monitoring environmental conditions.
meanings.sent5: The multiparameter system revolutionized data collection in the lab.
